description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. This ain’t the North Pole as you know it…this is zombie country and Santa’s a-comin’ to town. From snipers to uzis to flamethrowers to mini-guns, he’s packing ‘em all. It’s bloody, it’s gory, you know you want to play it!
description.short: This ain’t the North Pole as you know it…this is zombie country and Santa’s a-comin’ to town. From snipers to uzis to flamethrowers to mini-guns, he’s packing ‘em all. It’s bloody, it’s gory, you know you want to play it!
